column4: i am looking  for a web design interface, anyone knows a good one?
web design interface? not an application?
you can always try running "aplay /dev/urandom" to get some noise going.. Please check the volume first... it can be quite loud
you're welcome.. there are several plain html editors in the repos.. not sure which one is recommended by the people who use them (I don't do much web developing myself).. but try bluefish
